```{r}
sp_data <- fdmr::load_tutorial_data(dataset = "priors", filename = "spatial_dataBris.rds")
covid19_data <- fdmr::load_tutorial_data(dataset = "priors", filename = "covid19_dataBris.rds")
```


```{r}
location_data = sp_data@data[,c("LONG", "LAT")]
```

```{r}
fdmr::fit_model(y="cases", fixed_x = "IMD", process_x = "Population", process_coords = location_data, data=covid19_data, time_variable="week" )
```

Then we can pass in a list of fixed effects


```{r}
fixed_effects = c("carebeds.ratio", "AandETRUE")
